sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Equitable Health Outcomes Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Equitable Health Outcomes Act.

sections.heading: Purpose. The purpose of this Act is to establish data collection standards to save lives, promote equitable health care outcomes, decrease health care costs, and ensure quality health care for all through a Health Outcomes Review Board
sections.text: Purpose. The purpose of this Act is to establish data collection standards to save lives, promote equitable health care outcomes, decrease health care costs, and ensure quality health care for all through a Health Outcomes Review Board.
